text: @RepMarkGreen @TheElleBenni @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump The same happens in Brazil. We’re in the middle of the Covid19 crisis and leftists are doing everything possible to stain president Bolsonaro’s image in order to have a reason to impeach him.
